query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS revenue_forecasts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  forecastDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  predictedRevenue INT NOT NULL,
  actualRevenue INT,
  confidence INT DEFAULT 80,
  method VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'linear_regression',
  metadata TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_forecastDate (forecastDate)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vi6psNnW8WQgE7.root --database myg3CGnPowa4b2r4PdCwpy --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS revenue_forecasts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  forecastDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  predictedRevenue INT NOT NULL,
  actualRevenue INT,
  confidence INT DEFAULT 80,
  method VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'linear_regression',
  metadata TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_forecastDate (forecastDate)
);
